extendedInfo.description: Scratch on your phone like a DJ on a turntable.Features:- Scratching on your phone's touch-screen- Select a background track from your music library- Scratch samples: Uuh, Bass, FreshDeep Scratch is published under the GPLv3 license. The source code is available here: http://github.com/brillenheini/DeepScratch

reviews.comment: It is like a real scrater & the effects are very deep and clear

reviews.title: P.O.S. app
reviews.comment: title says it all don\'t waste your time downloading this. it makes two lame sound fx. doesn\'t track audio playback if your using a track with it, will just make the lame effect noises. this is garbage should have never been released. anyone giving this 5 stars is either mentally retarded or getting paid for it...

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Completely unrealistic
reviews.comment: I\'m a turntablist myself. Not a pro or battle DJ. Just a guy with a pair of Technics 1200\'s, a Vestex 05 Pro and a love for cutting it up. I\'m probably about an 8 on the skill level if 10 was best. I\'ve been looking for a good app to simulate scratching on my Android. This is not that app. It\'s fun if you\'re not looking for the real deal and just want to FEEL like a DJ but if you really know how to scratch and watch something close to that, avoid at all costs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I actually like it! And I\'m a DJ. It\'s not like the real thing but its good enough for me.

reviews.title: Nice idea, crap execution
reviews.comment: App was pretty unresponsive - you don\'t get much sense of being in control of the scratching. I then had to force close shortly after tapping \'Select music\'.
